pageContext.claim: “We have 25 percent now on $50 billion. And by the way, Peter, that’s a lot of money pouring into our Treasury, you know. We never made 5 cents with China. We're getting right now 25 percent on $50 billion.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. These tariffs are borne by companies and eventually passed on to consumers. It's not a pot of money in the U.S. Treasury. The United States has been generating revenue from trade with China since the 18th century.
